body.content:
Good day to you,

My name is Mr.John K. 
I am contacting you to ask for your
partnership/assistance to transfer US$25,000,000.00 to your country
for investment purposes under your assistance.
Your sincere cooperation is anticipated. I will furnish you with more
details and procedures upon receipt of your response.
Kindly reply directly to my private email id
for more details.
My regards,
John kaba
Cell Number +27785098477
